     ???                                                             ???
       ??          Softube.Vintage.Amp.Room.VST.RTAS.v1.05          ??
        ?                                                           ?
        ??                                                         ??
         ?  SUPPLIER ..: TEAM AiR                                  ?
         ?  PROTECTION : PACE/iLOK                                 ?
         ?  SIZE ......: 03 * 4,77MB  	      		           ?
         ?  DATE ......: 10/2007                                   ?
         ?                                                         ?
         ?  Straightforward and simple,  Vintage Amp Room  Native  ?
         ?  emulates three  carefully selected  guitar amps  in a  ?
         ?  complete  studio  set-up  with  speaker  cabinets and  ?
         ?  fully flexible microphone positioning. The sound  you  ?
         ?  will get from this  product is raw and  realistic, so  ?
         ?  you can achieve results that work in the present, and  ?
         ?  far into the future.                                   ?
         ?                                                         ?
         ?  Vintage Amp Room Native has none of the added gadgets  ?
         ?  or   weird-sounding   presets   sometimes   found  in  ?
         ?  simulation   software.   Focusing   on   quality  and  ?
         ?  accuracy,  it  simulates amps  with  sounds that  are  ?
         ?  timeless and authentically raw. The three amps  range  ?
         ?  from  pleasant guitar  sounds with  warm yet  intense  ?
         ?  power amp distortion, through clean, crisp and clear,  ?
         ?  but also warm, thick and punchy, all the way to edgy,  ?
         ?  distorted rock n&#039; roll sounds.                         ?
         ?                                                         ?
         ?  Vintage  Amp  Room Native  is  easy to  use  for live  ?
         ?  performances and recordings, as well as for re-amping  ?
         ?  and last-minute tweaking. The goal is not to give you  ?
         ?  a pre-produced, ultimate guitar sound, but to provide  ?
         ?  you  with  the  ultimate  tool  to  create  your own.  ?
         ?  Because after all, only  you know exactly what  sound  ?
         ?  you want                                               ?
         ?                                                         ?
         ?                                                         ?
         ?  Main Features                                          ?
         ?                                                         ?
         ?  Three great-sounding vintage  amp models that  handle  ?
         ?  like real amps                                         ?
         ?                                                         ?
         ?  Raw & authentic sound                                  ?
         ?                                                         ?
         ?  Flexible & continuous click-and-drag mic positioning   ?
         ?                                                         ?
         ?  Fully automatable parameters                           ?
         ?                                                         ?
         ?  3-D rendered photo-realistic user interface            ?
         ?                                                         ?
         ?  Compatible with all effects that work with real amps.  ?
         ?                                                         ?
         ?                                                         ?
         ? <a href=" http://www.softube.se/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.softube.se/</a>                                 ?
         ?                                                         ?
         ?                                                         ?
         ?                                                         ?
         ?                                                         ?
         ?                                                         ?
         ?  Installation Notes :                                   ?
         ?  --------------------                                   ?
         ?                                                         ?
         ?  1) Unzip, Unrar and run Setup.exe                      ?
         ?                                                         ?
         ?  2) Enjoy this fine Team AiR release !!!                ?
         ?                                                         ?
